    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location -
      resources - Method invoked at the creation of controller, sets icon in view, binds StringProperty to TextField and sets logic to login button (if enter button pressed, fires login method)

    • initModel

      public void initModel​(Inbox model)
      Parameters:
      model - model to be assigned to class field Initializes model of controller with model given

    • checkEmail

      public void checkEmail()
      Checks if mail address given belongs to regex pattern or not. If it does, delegates login to model and sets main page view, stylesheet and hooks controller to view. If mail doesn't match pattern or is null, alerts the User and let him recompile textfield.
